description:
After defeating the Bagra Army again, Taiki`s team heads to the Magma Zone. When the team is attacked by more Bagra troops led by DeathMeramon, Dorulumon dashes in to save them. Taiki asks Dorulumon to travel with them, but he refuses and leaves again with Cutemon. Later Taiki learns that the local Digimon are being forced into slavery by the Bagra Army and sets off into a cave to rescue them, but he`s found by the Bagra Army and the giant volcano Digimon, AncientVolcamon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 火山デジモン, 大爆発!
